name: Deleted! [Userstyles]
description:
Squeezes the Userstyles 'Deleted!' banner into the space ordinarily used by the screenshot.

(Which isn't shown for deleted styles, so nothing's lost.)
additional_info:
For example, any of these: https://userstyles.org/styles/graveyard
    2015-12-10:
  • Increased the effective min-height of the deletion message to accommodate a 350w x 263h screenshot in the suggested replacement.
  • Removed the (unseen) placeholder and its animation added by style 121465. Chrome's Developer Tools sets opacity < 1 of the element you're inspecting. The 'no screenshot' placeholder image is covered by the deletion message, so inspecting the deletion message requires everything above the placeholder to be redrawn. When the placeholder is animated, Chrome continually redraws it and everything above it - 100% CPU, 0% battery.
